text: Yarra Trams runs the tram network in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. The trams are owned by VicTrack. Yarra Trams is the branding name of the operator of the Melbourne's tram network in Victoria, Australia. As of 2025, Yarra Trams looks over 24 routes, 1,770 stops, and more than 500 trams. While mantaining 250 km (155 mi) of double track, and 9 depots. Making Melbourne's tram network the largest in the world.
title: Yarra Trams
